metadata.dc:author: Manero, F J
Bell, S
Hernández, A
Herrero, Y
Chacón, E
Larraga, R
metadata.dc:description: We describe two patients with diffuse alveolar hemorrhage and Wegener s Granulomatosis. In both cases, ANCA were demonstrated. We discuss the profit about ANCA s in the diagnosis and management the systemic vasculitis.
metadata.dc:title: Anticuerpos anticitoplasma de neutrófilo en dos pacientes con granulomatosis de Wegener.
[Antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibodies in 2 patients with Wegener's granulomatosis].
